activities.name: Delete1
activities.description: delete the source file after copying into the destination

scriptLines: {Bond Actor Salary} = sum({Bond Actor Salary})) ~> aggregate1
{Bond Actor Salary} = round(sum({Bond Actor Salary}),2)) ~> aggregate2
split1@YearBelow2000 derive({Bond Actor Salary} = coalesce({Bond Actor Salary}, 0)) ~> derivedColumn1
